title: Bug 121170 - get column label from meta data object should return user recognizable strings
OB: The current implementation of the getcolumnlabel method in the meta data object does not return any recognizable labels.
EB: The getcolumnlabel method in the meta data object should return user recognizable strings that can be displayed to the end user.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Obtain a meta data object. 
2. Call the getcolumnlabel method on any column in the meta data object. 
3. Check the returned value and observe that it does not provide any recognizable label.
